amendatorysection.catchline: Class V school district; sale of site; petition; contents.
amendatorysection.para: The school district may file a petition in the district court of the county in which such real estate as described in section 79-10,127 is situated, setting forth the terms and conditions of the original deed from the State of Nebraska, the provisions of sections 79-10,127 to 79-10,135, and the findings of the board of education as to the desirability of sale.
